document: @TheHamilcast @Lin_Manuel @MPSmithnyc @GillianWithaG @HamiltonMusical That was an incredible day. Fun to look back on. Thank you for making The Thing that keeps brightening and enlightening. #ProudPeep™️ #ChillisOverrated
@peterdaou Made me believe in hope. It’s gone now.
@PaganChild She has a race too. I don’t think it will have any effect.
@WSPate Good work! Or rather, good play! (And plays).

@TheHamilcast I’m feeling very unprepared to see Angelica tour this week because I haven’t “met” any cast members on @TheHamilcast. I’ve been studying up, but I realize how unprepared I am and how much more I knew about NYC and Philip tour. 😳

@DavidKorins @ABrightMonster @MurphyMade @BeetlejuiceBway @lesliekritzer @RobMcClure @SOPHIANNECARUSO @KerryButlerNyc @NatTheatreDC That shot! Love that WIL costume too. I’m looking forward to Halloween with @BeetlejuiceBway .
@SOPHIANNECARUSO @EW I’m excited to be there for Halloween this year! Also, @ABrightMonster ‘s costume looks amazing. Good work from WIL! Can’t wait to see your look!

@dsellington I love @NikkyWalks, saw and was blown away by him in Vegas. But I also love seeing standbys and swings and understudies. I’m seeing The Skit™️ three times @DPAC. Is it okay if I cross my fingers one of those times will be you? 💛🖤
@RobMcClure @BeetlejuiceBway @NatTheatreDC @ABrightMonster @MurphyMade That costume is a William Ivey Long special, I can tell.

@divarobbie I started to #WalkJogRun (to a Broadway favs playlist) and dropped two sizes in two months. For someone with scant metabolism and little discipline nor willpower, it was a HUGE deal. I get it.

@ConroeBrooks @Dianaseamon1 This hurts so much to hear. I’m sorry that people can’t recognize generosity & talent. I’m grateful to anyone who takes the time after a grueling performance to do the stagedoor. You don’t owe us this, and are certainly justified in choosing to take care of yourself instead.

@ConroeBrooks I just took my friend to see Hamilton (my 8th time), and what she talked about more than anything was the amazing ensemble work. The energy, the talent, the non-stoppedness of each member. You all are why I’ll see TheSkit™️ 3 more times when you grace my hometown, Durham.

@khjelmgaard @USATODAY Well, it’s quite clear that a centrist Republican Party died years ago. They have no norms nor civility in their grab for power. At least Democrats are motivated to help others. Current GOP enjoy cruelty and hurting anyone different from them.

@BroadwayGirlNYC @WaitressMusical Though when I was growing up it was:
“I’m not good, I’m not nice, I’m just right.”

@BroadwayGirlNYC @WaitressMusical No more giants waging war!
Can't we just pursue our lives, with our children and our wives...how do you ignore
...all the curses...the false hopes, the good-bye's
The reverses
All the wondering what even worse is still in store
All the children
All the giants...
No more

@ChristinePedi @sxmOnBroadway Thanking you AGAIN for bringing to my notice the enthralling @54Below show of @TonyYazbeck and @LauraOsnes. I went tonight, my first time there. So, so, so good. Gershwin, Bernstein, past hits — and dance! Who could ask for anything more? https://t.co/Y99sBZbDi0
